scripts.build: concurrently --names "MAPLIBRE,MAPLIB-C,LEAFLET ,LEAFLE-C,REACT   ,TYPES   " "npm run build-maplibre" "npm run build-maplibre-controller" "npm run build-leaflet" "npm run build-leaflet-controller" "npm run build-react" "npm run build-types"
scripts.build-maplibre: FLAVOUR=maplibre vite build && mv dist/maplibregl.umd.cjs dist/maplibregl.umd.js
scripts.build-maplibre-controller: FLAVOUR=maplibregl-controller vite build && mv dist/maplibregl-controller.umd.cjs dist/maplibregl-controller.umd.js
scripts.build-leaflet: FLAVOUR=leaflet vite build && mv dist/leaflet.umd.cjs dist/leaflet.umd.js
scripts.build-leaflet-controller: FLAVOUR=leaflet-controller vite build && mv dist/leaflet-controller.umd.cjs dist/leaflet-controller.umd.js
scripts.build-react: FLAVOUR=react vite build && mv dist/react.umd.cjs dist/react.umd.js
scripts.order-dist-files: mv dist/ReactGeocodingControl.d.ts dist/react.d.ts && mv dist/MaplibreglGeocodingControl.d.ts dist/maplibre.d.ts && mv dist/maplibreglMapController.d.ts dist/maplibregl-controller.d.ts && mv dist/LeafletGeocodingControl.d.ts dist/leaflet.d.ts && mv dist/leafletMapController.d.ts dist/leaflet-controller.d.ts && cp -r LICENSE README.md package.json src dist
scripts.build-and-order-dist-files: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run order-dist-files
scripts.pack: npm run build-and-order-dist-files && cd dist && npm pack
scripts.pub: npm run build-and-order-dist-files && cd dist && npm publish
